Spell-Amp.effect: Gain +1 Spell-Amp. You may Play another Card this turn.

Smuggle.effect: Gain 1 Gold. You may Play an additional Card this Turn.

Plan Ahead.effect: Pick a Card from your Deck. Put that Card on top of your Deck. You draw 1 less Card at the end of your turn.

Quick Draw.effect: Draw 2 Cards. Skip your next Turn.

Sniper.effect: Use any Card in your Deck that deals Damage.

Restoration.effect: Remove any 5 Damage from a Boss card.

Copycat.effect: Use 1 copy of the Card most previously Played.

Advantage.effect: Draw 1 Card. Instantly Play it without paying its Cost.

Toll Fee.effect: Add 1 Card from your Deck to your Hand.

Recycle.effect: Add 1 Card from your Discard pile to your Hand.

Gunshot.effect: Deal 2 Damage then put this Card on top of your Deck.

Arcane Trickery.effect: Gain 3 Mana. You Draw 1 less Card at the end of your turn.

Focus Energy.effect: Gain 5 Mana until the end of your turn. You may Play an additional Card this turn.

Finders Keepers.effect:
Demand: Discard 3 Cards. 
Reward: Banish this Card. 
Whenever you Discard a Card: add a Card from your Discard pile to your Hand.

Arcane Storm.effect: Deal 2 Damage. Then deal 2 Damage to the same target.

Rapid Fire.effect:
Demand: Deal 10 Damage. 
Reward: Shuffle all Damaging Cards from your Discard pile into your Deck. 
When you use a Card that deals Damage, you may use another Card that deals Damage. You may only use this effect twice per Turn.

Rattle Bones.effect: Deal 1 Damage for every 1 Card in your Discard pile.

Energy Conversion.effect: Pay any amount of Mana. Gain Spell-Amp equal to the amount of Mana paid. You may Play an additional Card this turn.

I'm Alive.effect: Return all of your Banished Cards to your Discard pile.

Subvert.effect: Banish all Cards in your Discard pile. Gain 1 Resource (split however you wish) for every 2 Cards you Banish using this Card’s effect.

Death and Decay.effect: Roll a 6-sided dice. Discard that many Cards from the top of your Deck and gain that many Resources (split however you wish).

Bragging.effect:
Demand: Your Opponent(s) Discard 2 Cards. 
Whenever an Opponent Discards a card; Draw a Card.

Witch's Incantation.effect:
Demand: Use 5 Mana. 
Reward: Summon a Boss (Lesser).

Deal with the Devil.effect: Discard your Hand. Summon a Boss Card (Greater).

Crystal Artifact.effect:
Demand: Play 5 Cards. 
Whenever you Play a Card gain +1 Spell-Amp.

Deny.effect: When an Opponent Plays a card that uses Mana, cancel that effect.

Lightning Strike.effect: Roll a dice, deal 2 Elemental Damage plus what you rolled.

Aim for the weakspot.effect: Deal Physical Damage equal to half of a Boss' current Health.

Mind Control.effect: Look at your opponent’s hand: Pick a card and add it to your hand.

Death Toll.effect: Use a Card from your Discard pile without paying for its Cost.
